# Government Tender Announcement

## General Information

* **Title:** Fire Alarm Maintenance Service
* **Reference Number:** cb-801-75271152
* **Solicitation Number:** 21301-25-4676949

## Tender Details

* **Publication Date:** April 3, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 13, 2024 @ 2:00:00 PM
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** No specified date
* **Expected Contract End Date:** No specified date
* **Tender Status:** Expired

## Procurement Information

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada free trade agreements with Chile, Colombia, Honduras, Panama, and Peru

## Contract Details

* **Contracting Authority:** Correctional Service Canada (Service correctionnel du Canada)
* **Contracting Authority Address:** 250 Montée St-François, Laval, Quebec, H7C 1S5, Canada
* **End Date:** This contract will end on April 30, 2027

## Requirements

* The contractor is required to perform mandatory annual tests on the fire alarm system at Donnacona Institution in accordance with standards CAN/ULC-S536 and CAN/ULC-537-19
* The contractor must provide a full report with a list of all inspections and tests, identifying any deficiencies and recommending actions to take for correction

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Kim Lavallée
* **Contact Title:** Procurement Authority
* **Contact Email:** [kim.lavallée@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:kim.lavallée@csc-scc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone:** 514-235-9156

## Attachments

* The tender document and associated files are available on the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) website

## Note to Bidders

* Interested suppliers can submit a bid
* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process
* Document may be submitted in either official language (English or French)  
* Procurement Assistance Canada (PAC) offers seminars to businesses interested in learning how to sell goods and services to the Government of Canada. The seminars are FREE.
